page.title: 20DOMESDAY WRITERS IN GLENLUCE
page.content: These pages of text on Glenluce were written by the children of{Glenluce {Primary School.}There are five classes and each class undertook to research several aspects of life in the D block Only two classes needed to make field trips, to find out about the{SSSI}and residential parts of the block. Most of the other information was collated from questionnaires which children took round the school, and from the ordnance survey maps of the area. Help was also received from the geography department of Stranraer Academy. {P6&7 children and staff did all the typing in of information. The Domesday Project was undertaken in June, 1985, in the midst of a very busy month which included an intensive swimming course for P7, outings to Calderpark Zoo, the Magnum at Irvine and the Royal Highland Show at Edinburgh.
